description: Hardy pecan (Carya illinoinensis) is an amazing tree to have in your garden. It is a hardy and versatile species that is native to North America and can thrive in most soil types. Hardy pecan produces clusters of nut-like fruit that are high in protein, minerals, and fatty acids. The tree can provide a great source of shade in the summer as well, and its sweet smell attracts beneficial pollinators. The wood is also valuable, as it is used for furniture and other craft items. Hardy pecan provides year round interest and beauty, making it a must have addition to any garden.
